body: This spell functions like minor creation, except that you can also create an object of mineral nature: stone, crystal, metal, or the like. The duration of the created item varies with its relative hardness and rarity, as indicated on the following table.
description: As minor creation, plus stone and metal.
level_text: Adept: 5; Arcanist: 5; Sorcerer: 5; Summoner: 4; Witch: 5; Wizard: 5

sections.body:
Hardness and Rarity ExamplesDuration
Vegetable matter2 hr./level
Stone, crystal, base metals1 hr./level
Precious metals20 min./level
Gems10 min./level
Rare metal*1 round/level
* Includes adamantine, alchemical silver, and mithral. You can't use major creation to create a cold iron item.
